{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking about which option is NOT involved in blood clotting. The provided options are related to coagulation factors and minerals. Calcium has a role in the clotting cascade, prothrombin is converted to thrombin during coagulation, fibrinogen is converted to fibrin, which forms a clot. Fe+2 (ferric iron) is not directly involved in blood clotting.", "answer_choice": "D"}
